page.description: When you click F1 in the Xbasic Editor or Action Script Editor, Alpha Anywhere will display help for the function, method, or language element under the cursor.

section.description: When working in the Code Editor, pressing F1 when your cursor is over an Xbasic function or method will display the appropriate help from the Xbasic Reference help file.
If no help topic can be found for the function, a message similar to the following will be displayed:
